nodes.text: The Greatest Battles was a children's book released by Golden Books in May 1998. The book included 3D artwork that readers viewed using 3D glasses that came with it. The cover price was $3.99.

The most famous galactic battles literally pop off the pages of this exciting 3-D book. While wearing the special included 3-D glasses, kids can watch the battles of Yavin, Hoth, Endor, and more come to three-dimensional life as they read about each strategic battle.
